鷰字的基本解释

鷰
yàn
同“燕1”。

鷰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》於甸切，去霰，影。］
燕子。

鷰字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷰； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1501第03
【廣韻】於甸切【集韻】伊甸切，?音宴。與燕同。【說文】薾口，布翅，枝尾，象形，亦書作䴏。又鷰濯，角觝之戲。【張衡·西京賦】衝狹鷰濯，胷突銛鋒。【註】鷰濯，以盤水置前，坐其後，踊身張手跳前，以足偶節，踰水復却坐，如燕之濯也。【玉篇】俗燕字。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　 Yan; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1501 No. 03
[Guang Yun] Yu Dian cut [Ji Yun] Eden cut, a feast. Same with Yan. 【Said Wen】Yukou, cloth wings, branch tails, pictograms, also written as 䴏. Yan Zhuo again, the play of horns. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] Chong narrow Yanzhuo, squatting and sharp front. [Note] Yanzhuo, put the pan water in front, sit behind, leaping forward with open arms, with the foot puppet festival, sitting again after the water, like a swallow. 【Jade articles】vulgar swallow characters.
